import Layout from "./layout.html.jsx"

export const meta = {
  id: "installation",
  title: "Installation",
}

export const layout = (props) => <Layout currentPageID={meta.id} {...props} />

# Installation

Install it globally with npm or Yarn:

```shell
❯ npm install --global @static/charge
```

```shell
❯ yarn global add @static/charge
```

Or add it to your application’s `package.json`:

```shell
❯ npm install --save-dev @static/charge
```

```shell
❯ yarn add --dev @static/charge
```

**Warning!** The `charge` package on npm is _not_ this package. You must use the scoped package name `@static/charge`.
